files.content:
// MenuModel.kt
import java.io.Serializable

data class MenuModel(val id: Int, val name: String, val description: String, val price: Double, val image: String, val comments: List<Comment>): Serializable

data class Comment(val id: Int, val content: String, val likes: Int)

<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context=".MenuActivity">

    <Button
        android:id="@+id/upload_button"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="上传照片" />

    <Button
        android:id="@+id/edit_button"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="编辑文字介绍" />

    <Button
        android:id="@+id/price_button"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="设定价格" />

    <Button
        android:id="@+id/comment_button"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="评论点赞" />

</LinearLayout>

<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context=".CommentActivity">

    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/comment_edittext"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:hint="请输入评论" />

    <Button
        android:id="@+id/post_button"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="发表评论" />

</LinearLayout>

<resources>

    <string name="app_name">牛太郎餐厅</string>

    <string name="menu_title">介绍菜品</string>

    <string name="upload_button">上传照片</string>

    <string name="edit_button">编辑文字介绍</string>

    <string name="price_button">设定价格</string>

    <string name="comment_button">评论点赞</string>

    <string name="comment_hint">请输入评论</string>

    <string name="post_button">发表评论</string>

</resources>
